mapper.select:
select p.productnum,c.catenum,c.catename,m.mcatenum,m.mcatename,p.productname, p.thumbimg ,p.productprice,p.totalstock, to_number(p.productprice - d.saleprice) sellprice, to_char(p.sellstart, 'YY/MM/DD') sellstart , to_char(p.sellfinish, 'YY/MM/DD') sellfinish, d.saleprice, floor(( d.saleprice/p.productprice)*100) as salepercent, to_char(d.salestart, 'YY/MM/DD') salestart, to_char(d.salefinish, 'YY/MM/DD') salefinish, count(od.orderquantity) as soldstock, to_number(p.totalstock - count(od.orderquantity)) as nowstock from product p join mcategory m on m.mcatenum = p.mcatenum join category c on c.catenum = m.catenum join discount d on d.productnum = p.productnum join orderdetail od on p.productnum = od.productnum
where p.userid = '${getuserid}' group by c.catenum,c.catename,m.mcatenum,m.mcatename,p.productnum,p.productname,p.thumbimg ,p.productprice,p.totalstock,p.sellstart,p.sellfinish,d.saleprice,d.salestart,d.salefinish, od.orderquantity order by p.productnum desc

select p.productnum,c.catenum,c.catename,m.mcatenum,m.mcatename,p.productname,p.thumbimg,p.productprice,p.totalstock, to_number(p.productprice - d.saleprice) sellprice, to_char(p.sellstart, 'YY/MM/DD') sellstart , to_char(p.sellfinish, 'YY/MM/DD') sellfinish, d.saleprice, floor(( d.saleprice/p.productprice)*100) as salepercent, to_char(d.salestart, 'YY/MM/DD') salestart, to_char(d.salefinish, 'YY/MM/DD') salefinish from product p join mcategory m on m.mcatenum = p.mcatenum join category c on c.catenum = m.catenum join discount d on d.productnum = p.productnum where p.productnum like '%${searchWord}%' or c.catenum like '%${searchWord}%' or c.catename like '%${searchWord}%' or m.catenum like '%${searchWord}%' or m.mcatename like '%${searchWord}%' or p.productname like '%${searchWord}%' or p.productprice like '%${searchWord}%' or d.saleprice like '%${searchWord}%' or sellstart like '%${searchWord}%' or sellstart like '%${searchWord}%' group by c.catenum,c.catename,m.mcatenum,m.mcatename,p.productnum,p.productname,p.thumbimg ,p.productprice,p.totalstock,p.sellstart,p.sellfinish,d.saleprice,d.salestart,d.salefinish order by p.productnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into product (productnum, userid, mcatenum, productname, productprice, saleselect, saleb, optionselect, sellstart, sellfinish, totalstock, nowstock, thumbimg, productcontent, deliveryoption, deliveryprice, paymentoption, selloption, sellweight,origin, wrapping, productinfomation, prevention, deadline) values(productsq.nextval, '${userid}' , ${mcatenum}, '${productname}', ${productprice}, '${saleselect}', '${saleb}', '${optionselect}', '${sellstart}','${sellfinish}', ${totalstock}, ${totalstock},'${thumbimg}', '${productcontent}', '${deliveryoption}', ${deliveryprice}, '${paymentoption}', '${selloption}', '${sellweight}', '${origin}', '${wrapping}', '${productinfomation}', '${prevention}', '${deadline}')
insert into discount (productnum, saleprice, salestart, salefinish) values(productsq.currval, ${saleprice}, '${salestart}', '${salefinish}')

insert into optiontbl (optionnum, productnum, optioname, optionstock, optionnowstock, optionprice) values (optionsq.nextval, productsq.currval, '${optioname}' ,${optionstock}, ${optionstock}, ${optionprice} )
